column1: '''quenta''' is a [[Quenya]] word translated as "account, narrative, story".<ref>{{VT
The word derives from the [[PQ]] noun *''[[kwentâ]]'' < [[root]] [[KWET]].<ref>{{LR
''Quenta'' is also the past participle of the verb ''[[quet-]]'' "speak", meaning "said". It is seen in several compounds.
